title: Pulse
description: AT ELLIS HOSPITAL, MURDER IS MAKING THE ROUNDS.When sweet young Chloe, everybody's favorite nurse, dies in the recovery room after a routine appendectomy, nurse Adele Monsarrat's suspicions are aroused. It's the third sudden death among the hospital staff in a year, and Adele is certain one of her coworkers is behind the onslaught. But who in this pressure-cooker workplace--where drugs, sex, and odd spiritual practices serve to ease tension--bears the mark of true madness? As Adele starts probing, the fever of fear soars, and a brilliant maniac watches and waits. . . .
author: Echo Heron
